about_the_game:
Enlist the League of Etherian Gem Miners to assist you in the battle against the Old Ones!

For 30 days, The Etherian Gem Miners will deliver 100 Gems each day you login to Dungeon Defenders II – that’s 2000 extra gems for free! Upon loading into the town or a map, you will receive a notification to redeem your delivery of gems.
detailed_description:
Enlist the League of Etherian Gem Miners to assist you in the battle against the Old Ones!

For 30 days, The Etherian Gem Miners will deliver 100 Gems each day you login to Dungeon Defenders II – that’s 2000 extra gems for free! Upon loading into the town or a map, you will receive a notification to redeem your delivery of gems.

name: Dungeon Defenders II - Autumn Etherian Gem Mine

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1) 64-Bit
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 2600 or better / NVIDIA GeForce 8600 or better, 512 MB video memory, with Shader Model 3 support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1) / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Quad-Core or better
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 or AMD Radeon HD 4770 or better (1GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play. Integrated graphics chips are not recommended.

short_description: Enlist the League of Etherian Gem Miners to assist you in the battle against the Old Ones!For 30 days, The Etherian Gem Miners will deliver 100 Gems each day you login to Dungeon Defenders II – that’s 2000 extra gems for free! Upon loading into the town or a map, you will receive a notification to redeem your delivery of gems.
